entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023
